i-firewall: Ihlunga ithrafikhi yenethiwekhi ngokusekelwe kusethi yemithetho
uhlelo olungayilungele ikhompuyutha: Igama elibanzi elihlanganisa amagciwane, izikelemu, amaTrojan, njll.
ubugebengu bokweba imininingwane ebucayi: Ama-imeyili omgunyathi azama ukukhohlisa abasebenzisi ukuthi banikeze ulwazi
i-ransomware: Uhlelo olungayilungele ikhompuyutha olubethela amafayela, lufuna inkokhelo yokususa ukubethela
ukubethela: Inqubo yokuphenya idatha ukuyenza ingafundeki ngaphandle kokhiye
ukususa ukubethela: Inqubo yokususa ukukrola idatha ebethelwe ibuyiselwe kufomu efundekayo
ukuxhaphaza: Ikhodi noma indlela esebenzisa ithuba lokuba sengozini
ukwephulwa kwedatha: Ukufinyelela okungagunyaziwe noma ukukhishwa kolwazi olubucayi
iphasiwedi: Uchungechunge oluyimfihlo lwezinhlamvu ezisetshenziselwa ukufakazela ubuqiniso
izici ezimbili zokuqinisekisa: Idinga ingxenye eyengeziwe yokuqinisekisa ngale kwephasiwedi
ubunjiniyela bezenhlalakahle: Ukukhohlisa abantu ukuthi banikeze ulwazi oluyimfihlo
ukuhlola ukungena: Ukuhlasela okulingisiwe okugunyaziwe ukuze kutholwe ubuthakathaka kusistimu
ukulawula ukufinyelela: Ukuphatha ukuthi ubani noma yini enezimvume kuzinsiza
uhlelo lokubona ukungena: Iqapha inethiwekhi noma amasistimu omsebenzi ongagunyaziwe
impendulo yesigameko: Isethi yezinqubo ezilandelwayo lapho kwenzeka umcimbi wokuvikela
ukuhlola ingozi: Ukuhlonza nokuhlola izinsongo ezingaba khona kanye nokuba sengozini
ukululama kwenhlekelele: Hlela ukubuyisela amasistimu nokusebenza ngemva kokuphazamiseka
